diseqc_port_settings_t Struct Reference

This structure contains initialisation parameters.

Data Fields

  • IMG_UINT32 ui32BlockIndex
  • IMG_BOOL bOverrideFreq
  • IMG_UINT32 ui32TargetFreq
  • DISEQC_RECEIVE_TIMINGS_T * psReceiveTimings
  • DISEQC_SEND_TIMINGS_T * psSendTimings
  • DISEQC_RECEIVE_T Receive
  • DISEQC_TONE_T Tone
  • DISEQC_POLARITY_T InputPolarity
  • DISEQC_POLARITY_T OutputPolarity
  • DISEQC_LOOPBACK_T Loopback
  • DISEQC_READ_UNEXPECTED_CALLBACK_T pfnReadUnexpectedCallback
  • IMG_BYTE * pui8UnexpectedData
  • IMG_UINT8 ui8UnexpectedDataMaxSize

Field Documentation

IMG_UINT32 diseqc_port_settings_t::ui32BlockIndex

DiSEqC Block Index

IMG_BOOL diseqc_port_settings_t::bOverrideFreq

If set to IMG_TRUE override the default 22khz clock frequency with ui32TargetFreq

IMG_UINT32 diseqc_port_settings_t::ui32TargetFreq

Override target frequency in mhz (Q12.20 notation). Ignored if bOverrideFreq is IMG_FALSE. The default value is 0x5A1D (22khz)

DISEQC_RECEIVE_TIMINGS_T* diseqc_port_settings_t::psReceiveTimings

Receive timings. IMG_NULL may be specified to use the defaults

DISEQC_SEND_TIMINGS_T* diseqc_port_settings_t::psSendTimings

Send timings. IMG_NULL may be specified to use the defaults.

DISEQC_RECEIVE_T diseqc_port_settings_t::Receive

Receive detection

DISEQC_TONE_T diseqc_port_settings_t::Tone

Tone generation/detection method for input and output

DISEQC_POLARITY_T diseqc_port_settings_t::InputPolarity

Polarity received on DiSEqC rx that defines an active tone. If Tone is set to DISEQC_TONE_SQUARE_WAVE this member is not used.

DISEQC_POLARITY_T diseqc_port_settings_t::OutputPolarity

Polarity generated on DiSEqC tx that defines an active tone. If Tone is set to DISEQC_TONE_SQUARE_WAVE this member is not used.

DISEQC_LOOPBACK_T diseqc_port_settings_t::Loopback

Loopback

DISEQC_READ_UNEXPECTED_CALLBACK_T diseqc_port_settings_t::pfnReadUnexpectedCallback

Unexpected data callback. If set to IMG_NULL unexpected bytes will be discarded if detected

IMG_BYTE* diseqc_port_settings_t::pui8UnexpectedData

Unexpected data buffer. Not used if pfnReadUnexpectedCallback is IMG_NULL. Can be set to IMG_NULL if notification of unexpected data is desired but the content of the message is not.

IMG_UINT8 diseqc_port_settings_t::ui8UnexpectedDataMaxSize

Size of the unexpected data buffer. If an unexpected message is received that is larger than the buffer the bytes at the end will be lost. Not used if pfnReadUnexpectedCallback is IMG_NULL.
